channel.title: Art on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Yaya's World

item.title: Am a Streamer Now
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: If you've been around my site for awhile than you probably know that I am an artist and a writer. Well, I haven't really been doing much writing of late, other than school papers, but I'm still a writer, okay? Well, anyway, I have a new hat! A streamer hat!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Persona 4 Golden is Over... Maybe?
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: It seems I have completed the last main dungeon for Persona 4 Golden. I'm planning on bringing my walkthrough up to that point today or tomorrow. Now, there is still the matter of, what I believe is, the Golden content. This is the part about finding Marie that, if memory serves (as I don't think she was even in the original) was added for the Golden re-release. So I still have content to work through, but its almost there. Also, I would like to point out that I have a reference generated for a new personal project and I plan on starting that tonight or tomorrow.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
